message.entry: The minimum and maximum frequencies (normalized by the maximum Doppler shift) for the RJakes doppler spectrum should be spaced by more than 1/50, FreqMinMaxRJakes has been reset to [0 1].
The minimum and maximum frequencies (normalized by the maximum Doppler shift) for the AJakes doppler spectrum should be spaced by more than 1/50, FreqMinMaxAJakes has been reset to [0 1].
SigmaGaussian must be less than 1/(10*sqrt(2*log(2))*fd*Ts), where fd is the maximum Doppler shift and Ts is the input sample period. It has been set to 0.99 times this value.
SigmaGaussian2 must be less than 1/(10*sqrt(2*log(2))*fd*Ts), where fd is the maximum Doppler shift and Ts is the input sample period.\nIt has been set to 0.99 times this value.
SigmaGaussian1 must be less than 1/(10*sqrt(2*log(2))*fd*Ts), where fd is the maximum Doppler shift and Ts is the input sample period.\nIt has been set to 0.99 times this value.
SigmaGaussian1 and SigmaGaussian2 must be less than 1/(10*sqrt(2*log(2))*fd*Ts), where fd is the maximum Doppler shift and Ts is the input sample period.\nThey have been set to 0.99 times this value.

CenterFreqGaussian1 and SigmaGaussian1 must be chosen such that abs(CenterFreqGaussian1) + SigmaGaussian1*sqrt(2*log(2))) <= 1.\nSigmaGaussian1 has been set to its maximum permissible value, i.e. (1-abs(CenterFreqGaussian1))/(sqrt(2*log(2))).

CenterFreqGaussian2 and SigmaGaussian2 must be chosen such that abs(CenterFreqGaussian2) + SigmaGaussian2*sqrt(2*log(2))) <= 1.\nSigmaGaussian2 has been set to its maximum permissible value, i.e. (1-abs(CenterFreqGaussian2))/(sqrt(2*log(2))).
